amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to require Federal land management policy to be followed in the notification of State and local government when presribed burns are to be conducted. \ As amended by the Udall (NM) amendment (A033), the above was replaced with language that prohibits funds from being used to conduct prescribed burns if all provisions of the Federal Wildland Fire Policy have not been implemented.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the BLM, the Park Service, and the Forest Service from conducting any prescribed burns before they implement federal wildland fire policies that would require notification and cooperation with tribal, State, and local governments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson amendment (A032) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
